How much does a Car Driver cost in Delhi NCR in 2024? What is the right monthly salary or charge for hiring Car Drivers in Delhi NCR in 2024?

The monthly cost of hiring Drivers in Delhi NCR varies between ₹17,000 and ₹18,000, depending on the car to drive and whether he’s driving a private or a commercial vehicle.
